pages.text: 37|127|ayinum, avarkal avaraip poyyakki vittanar. Atalal, niccayamaka avarkal (marumaiyil nam'mitam tantanaikkakak) kontu varappatuvarkal
37|128|allahvutaiya kalapparra atiyarkalait tavira, (nallatiyarkalukku nalla canmanamuntu)
37|129|pirkalattil ullavarkalilum ivarutaiya kirttiyai nilaikkac ceytom
37|130|(akave ulakattilullavarkal) ‘‘ilyasukku ‘‘salam'' (iterram) untavatakuka!'' (Enru kurukinranar)
37|131|niccayamaka nanmai ceypavarkalukku nam ivvare kuli kotukkirom
37|132|niccayamaka avar nampikkai konta nam atiyarkalil oruvaraka iruntar
37|133|niccayamaka luttum nam tutarkalil oruvartan
37|134|Avaraiyum avarutaiya kutumpam muluvataiyum patukattuk kontom
37|135|ayinum, (avarutaiya) oru kila (manai)viyait tavira, aval (antap pavikalutan) tankivittal
37|136|(piraku pavam ceyta) marravarkalaiyum nam alittu vittom
37|137|akave, (makkavacikale! Ninkal varttakattirkaka sam tecam pokumpolutum, varumpolutum) kalaiyilo malaiyilo, niccayamaka ninkal (alintupona) avarkalai katantu celkirirkal
37|138|(itaik kontu ninkal) nallarivu peraventama
37|139|niccayamaka yunusum nam tutarkalil oruvartan
37|140|(makkalal) nirainta kappalin pakkam avar tappi otiya camayattil (atil erikkontar)
37|141|a(kkappalil ulla)varkal cittu (kulukki)p pottatil ivar (katalil) eriyappata ventiyavaranar
37|142|(avvaru avarkal ivarai eriyave) min avarai vilunki vittatu. Accamayam, avar tannaittane nintittuk kontiruntar
37|143|niccayamaka avar nam'mait tuti ceypavarkalil oruvaraka illatiruntal
37|144|(marumaiyil) eluppappatum nal (varum) varai avar atan vayirril tankiyiruntiruppar
37|145|(avar tuti ceytiruppatan karanamaka) vetta veliyana pumiyil (min vayirriliruntu) avarai nam eriyac ceytom. Accamayam avaro mika kalaipputanum corvutanum iruntar
37|146|akave, avarukku (nilalituvatarkaka) oru curaiccetiyai mulaippittom
37|147|pinnar, nam avarai oru nurayiram allatu atarku atikamana makkalitam nam tutaraka anuppi vaittom
37|148|avarkal anaivarum nampikkai kontarkal. Atalal, namum avarkalai oru (ninta) kalam varai cukamaka valavaittom
37|149|(napiye!) Avarkalai ketpiraka: ‘‘(Ninkal verukkum) pen makkalai unkal iraivanukkum unkalukku an makkalaiyuma? (Virumpukirirkal)
37|150|Allatu nam vanavarkalaip penkalaka pataitta(takak kurukinranare a)tai avarkal parttuk kontiruntarkala
37|151|‘‘allah (pillaikalaip) perran enru'' ivarkal karpanaiyana poyyaiye kurukirarkal enpatai niccayamaka nir arintu kolviraka. Niccayamaka ivarkal poyyarkale
37|152|‘‘allah (pillaikalaip) perran enru'' ivarkal karpanaiyana poyyaiye kurukirarkal enpatai niccayamaka nir arintu kolviraka. Niccayamaka ivarkal poyyarkale
37|153|(atilum) an cantatikalaivittu, pen cantatikalaiya avan terntetuttuk kontan
